long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace the new tab page with simple dashboard featuring a task list or daily philosophical quotes.

Opening a new tab page with NihiLists reveals serene black and white photography with the option to do something or nothing. One option reveals a task list that syncs across browsers so no matter where you are, you can accomplish something. The other displays daily quotes from Nihilist philosophers to remind us that nothing in the world has a real existence and that life is meaningless.  

• To do list
• New sardonic photo and quote each day
• Finally learn what Nihilism really is
• Feel meaningless and get things done!

☆☆☆ Featured on Product Hunt ☆☆☆
